DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Tumor Burden and/or Volume Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Number that represents the measurement of the metastatic tumor burden and/or tumor volume.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Metastatic Neoplasm Tumor Burden And/Or Tumor Volume
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology._Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The size of a cancer measured by the amount of space taken up by the tumor. For example, the tumor volume of prostate cancer is the percentage of the prostate taken up by the tumor.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.

Property.preferredDefinition: Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The size of a cancer measured by the amount of space taken up by the tumor. For example, the tumor volume of prostate cancer is the percentage of the prostate taken up by the tumor.

Concepts.definition: Refers to the number of cancer cells, the size of a tumor, or the amount of cancer in the body.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Dr. Turkbey P173316 request 11.21.17 mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed with a max of 6 characters and 2 decimals, units of measure not specified.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
